Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Under Virginia law, localities relative to this election are required to cover the cost of a recount when the margin of error is at or below .5 percent.
Document Sources.Source Justification: governing election recount costs in Virginia

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: On August 1, a three-panel recount court reviewed the election returns that officials from 24 localities transported to the Goochland County Circuit Court.
